::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe enters the main room, seeing Zyber apparently asleep in 
front of the fire. He sits down, looking at Zyber. He was eager to 
get back out into the world, but he could wait days for a victim, and 
Zyber was no different.

He watches her, ready for any movement.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Zyber yawned and stretched in front of the fire, watching the 
flickering 
> flames and glad to finally be dry.
> She hoped that later on she would be able to hunt and gather food, 
the 
> Matrix knew just when Blaster was supposed to be healed yet.
> But she had given him some of the most powerful concosions she had, 
and his 
> recovery should be quick.
> 
> Zyber closed his eyes and moved into a more comfortable position, 
completely 
> devoide of hearing DeathScyth raise himself from the bed and walk 
from the 
> chamber...bent on seeking her out.*
